text:
Question 91) Hay Quien Dice Sola goat that soy as a goat; LO DICEN LO REPITEN, YA LO CREO; Pero Soy Una Cabra Muy Extraña that llegs una medalla y siete cuernos. Goat! EN TIME OF MALE LECHE YO DOY LLANTO. Goat! For her badly poligorous me. Goat! Me llevo bien con alimañas all, go goat! Y Scrutwear en los Tebeos. I live sole, goat sole, - which does not want to go go comparement - cuando I go up to the high of this valle sigrere in a lirio de jeloo. Y vivo for mi cuenta, goat sole; That Yo to Ningún Rebaño belonging. If you can be like a goat, beyond, in the Dudar of Ello.
FUESTES, G. Poet of Guardia. Barcelona: Lumen, 1990.
In the poem, the lyrical self compares to the goat and in the fifth verse uses the expression “leche suitcase” to self -represent as a person
A) influenced by the opinion of the others.
B) aware of its difference before the others.
C) shaped by not belonging to any group.
D) brave in the face of risky situations.
E) capable of turning a bad mood into tears.
